title: 34,000 MT of Diesel to reach SL soon
body_lines: COLOMBO (News 1st); The Minister of Energy, Gamini Lokuge said that another 34,000 MT of fuel is to be delivered to Sri Lanka under the Indian credit line.
The Minister said that the fuel will be delivered to the island on the 31st of March 2022.
Lokuge further said that a fuel concession program for fishermen is expected to be established in the future.
Moreover, he said that if such a program is established, the Energy Ministry is ready to implement it.
